org.sindice.siren.search.node

Class TupleQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.sindice.siren.search.node.NodeQuery
        • org.sindice.siren.search.node.TwigQuery
          • org.sindice.siren.search.node.TupleQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class TupleQuery
extends TwigQuery
    A NodeQuery that matches tuples, i.e., a boolean combination of NodeQuery having the same parent node.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.sindice.siren.search.node.TwigQuery

    • Constructor Detail

      • TupleQuery

        public TupleQuery()
        Constructs an empty tuple. By default, the level of the tuple query is 1.

        Similarity.coord(int,int) is disabled by default.

      • TupleQuery

        public TupleQuery(int level)
        Constructs an empty tuple query at a given level.
        Parameters:
        disableCoord - disables Similarity.coord(int,int) in scoring.

      • TupleQuery

        public TupleQuery(boolean disableCoord)
        Constructs an empty tuple query. Similarity.coord(int,int) may be disabled in scoring, as appropriate. For example, this score factor does not make sense for most automatically generated queries, like WildcardQuery and FuzzyQuery.
        Parameters:
        disableCoord - disables Similarity.coord(int,int) in scoring.

      • TupleQuery

        public TupleQuery(int level,
          boolean disableCoord)
        Constructs an empty tuple query. Similarity.coord(int,int) may be disabled in scoring, as appropriate. For example, this score factor does not make sense for most automatically generated queries, like WildcardQuery and FuzzyQuery.
        Parameters:
        disableCoord - disables Similarity.coord(int,int) in scoring.
